definition: to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: Fighting Space Wars must be supported by many different weapons systems.
sentences.chinese: 打空间战必须有多种不同武器系统作支撑。

sentences.english: The British vehicles are the first customers for the new weapon system.
sentences.chinese: 英国车辆是该新武器系统的第一批客户。

sentences.english: The system was built in an effort to create a "one-mech" defensive system capable of taking down a starship.
sentences.chinese: 武器系统被改造成了一个能容纳星际飞船的防御系统。

sentences.english: Anywhere between 2, 2 and 300 rounds depending on weapons system.
sentences.chinese: 从2发到300发的射击，全看武器系统而定。

sentences.english: The crew consists of a pilot and weapon system operator.
sentences.chinese: 机组人员由一个飞行员和武器系统操作员。

sentences.english: High power lasers and high power microwave systems will both benefit from this technology.
sentences.chinese: 高能激光和高能微波武器系统将从该项技术中获益。

sentences.english: Equipment and weapon systems are being upgraded.
sentences.chinese: 设备和武器系统正在升级。

sentences.english: The purpose of this paper is to study the Petri Nets (PN) model of anti-air combating process of combined-arms of missile and flack (CAMF).
sentences.chinese: 研究建立弹炮结合武器系统防空作战过程的PN模型。

sentences.english: Weapon system is an important part of modern shipborne weapon system.
sentences.chinese: 武器系统是现代作战系统的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Reliability is an important performance index of the ground-to-air missile weapon system.
sentences.chinese: 可靠性是地空导弹武器系统的重要性能指标之一。

sentences.english: Photoelectric collimator is a kind of simple fire-control system equipped on a weapon system.
sentences.chinese: 光电瞄具是配备于某武器系统上的一种简易火控系统。

sentences.english: Its basic crew requirements are 45, with additional 46 to operate the weapons systems.
sentences.chinese: 它至少需要45名艇员，额加46人操作武器系统。
他们正在关闭武器系统。

sentences.english: On service probability of ship-to-air missile based on improved queuing theory;
sentences.chinese: 给出了舰空导弹武器系统服务概率的定义。

sentences.english: This supply the theoretic bases to chose the missile weapon system for the aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 为飞机配装导弹武器系统的选型提供理论依据。

sentences.english: Other weapon systems can be installed including anti-tank guided missiles.
sentences.chinese: 其它的武器系统能被安装包括反坦克导弹。

definition: opportunity in a battle/fighter aircraft/war secret
